entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - ÁVÜ Privatisation 1993. Opinions of managers about the Hungarian privatization.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C63m: TÁRKI - ÁVÜ Privatisation 1993. Opinions of managers about the Hungarian privatization.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Kolosi, Tamás
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: how members of certain layers of society experience the process of privatisation; the role and importance, result and benefits of privatisation; political views, orientations - investigation of complex views on privatisation
entry.dcterms:subject: social stratification and groupings
social change
political institutions, public administration
mass political behavior, attitudes
economic conditions and indicators
economic systems and development
economic organization
survey data
cross-section

Manager sample, 6x100 persons, firm and company managers based on sources by the Hungarian Agency of National Wealth (ÁVÜ), the Hungarian State Administrator of National Wealth (ÁV Rt.) and the Central Statistical Office (KSH). The subsamples are not representative separately.
face-to-face interview
A
